features.featureTitle: Update the centralized copy in `frontend/src/content/dreamonomyCopy.ts` to replace the existing placeholder “Why Choose Us” content with the user-provided “WHY CHOOSE US” text, stored in a structure that preserves the original headings and bullet lists (no paraphrasing).

On the Home page (`frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`), replace the current “Why Choose Us” 3-card block layout with a single large paragraph-style content box, styled consistently with the existing “Message from the Founder” box (rounded container, padding, border/shadow), and render the new user-provided “Why Choose Us” copy inside it (including headings and bullet lists).

On the About/Why page (`frontend/src/pages/AboutWhyPage.tsx`), replace the current “Why Choose Us” grid-of-reasons cards layout with a single large paragraph-style content box, styled consistently with the existing “Message from the Founder” box, and render the same user-provided “Why Choose Us” copy inside it (including headings and bullet lists).
